name: Satanic Dystopia-Double Denim Shotgun Massacre(Full lenght album cassette)
description: Debut album from these UK black thrashers(whom all share a fondness for Celtic Frost, Aura Noir, Judas Priest and cheap, sleazy cinema). Spawned from the Northern wastelands during winter candlemass Satanic Dystopia was called upon to pay tribute to masters of old, visual atrocities and unholy violence. On the Sixth day of April the Double Denim Shotgun Massacre rituals took place under the sign of the black mark in Rottingham, England. Eight tracks of black thrashing metal were recorded to bring heathens to their knees. Tracks: 1.Double Denim Shotgun Massacre 2.Steel Breeze 3.Nuclear Nightmare 4.Blood, Spit, & Concrete 5.Bastard Squad 6.Tombstone Queen 7.Black Stallion 8.Satanic Dystopia Listen Satanic Dystopia-Blood, Spit, Concrete

name: Earthlord-Earthmission(Cassingle)
description: Earthlord was a short lived project from 2007 featuring members of HOUR OF 13, UPWARDS OF END TIME, and LEGEND(epic traditional heavy metal band from CT that recorded their one single album “FROM THE FJORDS” in 1979). The songs featured on this release were attended for a vinyl split release with VESTAL CLARET which never came to pass. These recordings have never had an official release till now. Tracks: 1.God OF Antiquity 2.He Who Is Of The Water Listen Earthlord-He Who Is Of The Water

name: Scorched-Earth- Marauders(Cassingle)
description: New tracks and unfortunately last recordings. Featuring Scorched-Earth's newest lineup. Sure to please fans of Venom, Sodom, Motorhead, early Bathory, Destroyer 666, Speedwolf and Midnight! Tracks: 1. Thy Kingdom Doomed/Marauders 2.Harken To Your Allfather 3.Fucking Metal Motherfuckers(Scepter cover) ***FREE DOWNLOAD @ NVS Bandcamp: http://novisiblescars.bandcamp.com/track/fucking-metal-motherfuckers-scepter-cover Listen Scorched-Earth-Thy Kingdom Doomed/Marauders

name: Slumber Room-Slumber Room Cassette Ep
description: A new project from M. Krutsinger(ex-IN MEMORIUM) & M. Nihilist(ex-IN MEMORIUM, LORD GORE, ABAZAGORATH). Minimal industrial black metal. The project draws influence/comparisons to Burzum's "Filosofem" , Mysticum, and a bit of Type O Negatives "Slow Deep And Hard". Tracks: 1.Slumber Room 2.Some One...Everyone...No One... 3.Our Shrine 4.Under The Dying Moon 5.Stellar Death Rites Listen Slumber Room-Under A Dying Moon

name: Abazagorath-Abazagorath CD ep 2012
description: Scar 025 After years of hiatus, Abazagorath has returned in full force. Brand new 5 track ep. " 8/10. Sometimes you just want a consistent torrent of sucker punches to the face, and in that light, Abazagorath has delivered in spades with their self-titled EP." metallicfaithimmortal.blogspot.com "5/5 "This self titled EP has set the bar so high for this band that going back to their debut full length would be punishment." scumfeastmetal666.blogspot.com "Abazagorath were on of the forerunners of the US Black Metal scene and their latest EP does their legacy justice. This is a true work of absolute evil" metaljunkie1.blogspot.com Sample: Abazagorath-Lapse by NoVisible Scars
